item.title: This Forgotten Disney Movie Released Just 1 Year After DreamWorks' Madagascar & Had Exactly The Same Plot
item.description: A year after DreamWorks released Madagascar, Disney released its own animated movie with a near-identical plot about runaway zoo animals.

item.title: Fast & Furious’ Brian Replacement Didn’t Work And Made A Franchise Problem Even Worse
item.description: Scott Eastwood’s character in the Fast & Furious franchise was never given the attention he deserved and failed at replacing Paul Walker’s Brian.

item.title: Willem Dafoe Defends Highly Controversial Lars Von Trier Horror Movie 16 Years Later
item.description: Willem Dafoe looks back on his experience filming director Lars von Trier's controversial 2009 horror film, suggesting it deserves a closer look.
